categories: Category:Star Wars: The Official Starships & Vehicles Collection departments

nodes.text: Welcome On Board is the main feature of Star Wars: The Official Starships & Vehicles Collection magazine. It gives a detailed biography of the individual highlighted on the issue's cover. This character is typically the owner of the craft the issue focuses on, which is also featured on the cover and, in the form of a die-cast collector's model, is packed in exclusively with the magazine.
